website_summaries.verdict: The Plantronics Savor M1100 is a powerful little headset with great features, excellent audio quality, and an affordable price tag to boot.
pros: The Plantronics Savor M1100 is small, lightweight, comfortable to wear, and has a dedicated power switch plus a dedicated voice recognition button
It features multipoint, A2DP streaming, voice alerts, and access to Plantronics Vocalyst, an automated phone service that lets you send e-mail, texts, and even tweets just with your voice
The overall audio quality is fantastic as well
cons: The Plantronics Savor M1100 only has a single volume button
The Vocalyst service is only free for the first year, plus you have to upgrade to the Pro level to get the speech-to-text feature

customer_reviews.title: Not for small ear canals
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed with this plantronics bluetooth headset. Even with the smallest ear tip adapter, I cannot get a secure fit. Yes, if manually pushed into place with my hand, the sound is terrific, but then that is hardly hands free. (And the second I let go, it practically falls out.) None of the reviews I read addressed this issue. Secondly, the volume controls are poorly designed - must go all the way up to go down and vice versa. I did find that comment in a review, but thought if it was as excellent as described otherwise, it would be worth that small inconvenience. Sadly, for me, it is wasted money because this headset will never be used.
customer_reviews.author: T. Barrett

customer_reviews.title: Not for the money
customer_reviews.text: I selected this product based on the reputation of Plantronics; however, the product disappointed me. Big problem utilizing with my iPhone 4S. I could make a call but as soon as I'd make a 2nd call I would hear nothing and yet I would be unaware the person I tried to call had answered and could hear me. I was constantly powering the unit Off and On. I still have the headset but now the On/Off switch is loose (caused by overuse from problem described above) and many times I miss a call not realizing my headset is on in my pocket. I will not look for a Plantronics product for my next purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Don

customer_reviews.title: It does voice dial. If your phone supports voice dialing.
customer_reviews.text: Turned it on. Activated Bluetooth and paired with one click. now it reconnects automatically. I don't like how it fits into the ear, but its my fist Bluetooth device. I don't know why it doesn't say specifically on the plantronics website that it, in fact, allows one to double tap the frontwards button and say "call mom" - and boom. hi mom. loving the way it works right now. I can also double tap the frontwards button and say "open weather, radarnow, calculator- etc.", and the app opens up. Its really silly that plantronics doesn't simply say that on the site...I think ima call them right now.
customer_reviews.author: Louie

customer_reviews.title: The Best Bleutooth Stereo For Sure
customer_reviews.text: I agree with all the reviews here. Nothing beats this headset. Why? - There is nothing more comfortable in your ear. You don't even know it is there. - With that saidm there is nothing that STAYS in your ear better. - The sound quality is excellent on both ends. - You can answer a call by just saying ANSWER. No buttons to hit at all. - It talks to you/ No guessing at cryptic light flashes to know if your battery needs charging. - It's small but rugged and well built. Plantronics has been my favorite for headsets for awhile... This raises the bar. If you are looking for a winner, I have NO complaints about these at all.
customer_reviews.author: MikeRadio

customer_reviews.title: Works Well
customer_reviews.text: I've gone through a LOT of bluetooth headsets - and that list unfortunately includes 3 different iterations of this one! The problem with all bluetooth headsets is that they easily get lost or left in pockets that go through the laundry. The first quality headset that is waterproof and/or has a beeper when your phone gets more 5 feet from it will get 5 stars from me. With that said, this headset has done the best job of balancing quality, price and portability that I have found so far. As a result, every time I feed my headset to the washing machine I go back for another one of these!
customer_reviews.author: LUCK

customer_reviews.title: Just OK
customer_reviews.text: I like a hard button for on and off and the volume on phone call is loud enough. The cons are when using is the AD2P mode is loses connection for a few seconds with the phone in either a jacket or pants pocket. The battery life is only 3-4 hours. The answer call button is difficult to activate and I missed a few calls. The Platronics PLT 165 is much better, with battery life of 7 hours, and less of an issue with answering calls. I still have not found a blue tooth headset that would rate 5 stars. Anyone that has, I welcome your suggestions
customer_reviews.author: Richard Parian

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the buy.
customer_reviews.text: Pros-Good sound quality and mike shoulds great Cons-Ear bud hurts after a while this thing is in my ear Weak battery Life barely goes 4 hours on full charge Loses Bluetooth connection alot with my iphone 4 in my pocket it starts to break up and lose connection Multipoint does not work that well its buggy most time I have to tell it there is a 2nd phone if it wants to connect to it its very random. After owning a m50 platronics which i can barely hear and a hx550 motorolla I would say those are both more stable and better products than this is.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Poor sound
customer_reviews.text: I didn't like this Bluetooth. It sounds badly even though it has noise cancellation. It is why I return it back as quickly as possible and order Plantronics M50 that sounds very clear. I can recommend Plantronics Savor M1100 to anyone. Please go to any physical store you see it, touch it, and if possible ask a seller if she/he has already try it. Because i am so disappointed of this bluetooth. But I did my home ork by reading others reviews. May it could be defective item the seller had sent to me even though it was described as brand new. Frankly, I was angry about this bluetooth. Disgusting!!!!!! Don't buy it!
customer_reviews.author: KOK

customer_reviews.title: Bluetooth Bummer
customer_reviews.text: After reading several reviews from this website as well as other websites, I decided to purchase this bluetooth since it was highly rated. Sad to say, this bluetooth was the pits! There was a lot of static during my phone conversations. Also the bluetooth would announce "answer" or "ignore" on an incoming call. It does not announce the phone number that is calling. I would always have to look at the phone to see who's calling. I understand that Vocalyst service will announce the phone number, but why pay extra for a feature that should be built into the bluetooth? I returned this bluetooth, and I will stick to my Jawbone bluetooths from now on.
customer_reviews.author: TF

customer_reviews.title: Plantronics Savor M1100 Bluetooth Headset
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the first Bluetooth headsets I purchased from Amazon, I didn't know enough, or I didn't read the whole description, and I assumed I was getting a brand new item, but I didn't it was clean but it came in a plastic bag with a charger and an ear gel, which it was too big for my ear, after 3 hours of use my ear started hurting, I tried different things but, I finally stop using it. It sounded good and people was hearing me very clear, but the fact that it hurt my ear was a deal breaker for me.
customer_reviews.author: ViLo

customer_reviews.title: M1100 - Best One I Have Owned So Far
customer_reviews.text: Having owned numerous "premium" priced Bluetooth devices from other manufacturers including the latest Bose and Jawbone ones, I elected to try this one out due to its smaller form factor and updated features. It has been a short period of ownership but I am highly impressed. The sound quality is amazing - crystal clear. The pairing was simple and quick with my Blackberry Bold. It is very lightweight and extremely comfortable and i don't even need to wear the over the ear piece. I also like the fact that I can listen to my downloaded music thru it. The Savor M1100 is simply perfect. I especially love the vocalist functions. Great job Plantronics - best bluetooth device ever! Period!!
customer_reviews.author: A. Aziminia

customer_reviews.title: Works like a charm ... And it works your ears
customer_reviews.text: This is truly one of the best Bluetooth units on the market. The sound quality is excellent and the 4 hour talk time allows for a couple of good conversations between charges. I've had only a couple of cons. The first is that the volume button is difficult to depress while the unit is on the ear, and the volume only cycles in one constant direction. Also, the lack of an around ear piece may be a problem if you don't have large ears. Overall, this is a fantastic device. It does its job well.
customer_reviews.author: J. Moore

customer_reviews.title: Plantronics Savor M1100 Bluetooth Headset Not For Me
customer_reviews.text: When I spoke with my mother using this device, she said I sounded like I was at the bottom of a well. When I removed it, she said it was much better. When I spoke with my next to oldest brother, he said I sounded like I was at the bottom of a large barrel. Removing it solved the problem; again! That was enough for me. I want to be heard, as well as hear. I cannot recommend this headset to anyone; and I had such high hopes for it after reading many glowing reviews, too! :-( YMMV, of course!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Finley

customer_reviews.title: Excellent device, but don't waste your time or money on their Vocalist service
customer_reviews.text: The least number of complains ever from callers. They sucked me into their $60 a year vocalist service that supposedly reads your email, sends texts, etc. the thing either doesn't hear you or there's a 20 second wait for it to respond to a command. I'm going to ask Plantronics for a refund on this service. It comes with a free trial with limited functionality. Try that and you will see what I mean. Would have been 5 stars but I had to drop it two for the horrible vocalist service.
customer_reviews.author: ChrisTheReviewer

customer_reviews.title: Muffled voice
customer_reviews.text: I found the headset almost to small. I only used it for one day and found the automated voice muffled. I could not find a comfortable position to wear it. I found the volume button a dumb idea as you have to toggle all the way through the volume adjustment instead of simply volume up, volume down. I gave it two stars because of Amazon. I had standard free shipping and recieved it in a couple of days. Returning it was very easy and pain free.
customer_reviews.author: Xcbikerider

customer_reviews.title: Caveat Emptor
customer_reviews.text: Purchased one of these a couple of years ago and was very satisfied with the headset. One of the best I had used to that point. Lost my original unit and replaced with this one through HDD Shop. Worked well for 10 weeks and since then the battery will no longer hold a full charge. Seller, in adherence with HDD policy indicated that there is nothing they would do as the 30-day limit had expired. Expected more from the product but also from the seller. HDD Shop is apparently satisfied with a "one-and-done" approach to customer service. So...Caveat Emptor.
customer_reviews.author: Suntzu

customer_reviews.title: GET THIS HEADSET!
customer_reviews.text: This is the PERFECT headset! I make my living on the road. Not only is this convenient... It conforms with all state laws. (Can't hold the cell phone in your hand.) PLUS... It is a *smart* headset... It works VERY well with my iPhone 4S. I can talk to Siri, dictate emails, have emails read back to me... Voice dial, etc. Plus... The sound is awesome and the volume is superb!
customer_reviews.author: R K

customer_reviews.title: Perfect and reasonable in cost
customer_reviews.text: I've tried multiple different Blue Tooth options, but rarely do they work across multiple pieces of technology. This one works well with phone, tablet and kindle. It looks much larger than it actually is, and wears very well. Others dislike the on/off slide. I prefer it, and have few problems with sound, pairing or the earpiece. I will likely order more.
customer_reviews.author: Bfield

customer_reviews.title: One of the best bluetooth headset!
customer_reviews.text: I bought the Plantronics Savor M1100 couple weeks ago, and I never regret it. I agree with the previous reviews - it is extremely easy to put it on, and it is very comfortable to wear. Pairing is automatic and requires no work! I like the voice-activated feature to answer or to ignore. Sound is very clear. The only thing I don't like is the volume button. Every press increases the volume but I cannot decrease the volume easily. I still give it a 5-star because no headset is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Francis Leung

customer_reviews.title: Just doesn't do the Job
customer_reviews.text: I might have high expectations. truth is, all i want from my Bluetooth ear piece is for it to: 1. Work at all times. 2. Have good quality sound both for the one on the other line as well myself. I'm disappointed i was willing to spend more so that these two wishes would come true. Sadly i'm not satisfied. I am still in search for the perfect one. – Would be happy to hear any suggestions.
customer_reviews.author: TGEH

customer_reviews.title: Hyped up
customer_reviews.text: This got all kinds of good reviews. I paid around $55 for it and am not pleased at all. People complained right away that they couldn't hear me. I also got the Plantronics M20 for about $27 and it lasts twice as long on a charge, people can hear me easy, and I can hear them. The only downside to the M20 was that you can't change the rubber earpiece for a better fit or comfort.
customer_reviews.author: Moomba2442

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Bluetooth Headset
customer_reviews.text: I've used this every day for about a year and am very pleased with the quality and durability. I mostly use it to listen to audiobooks with my phone or IPad, but it also is very good for phone conversations while driving. With an IPhone 5, I am able to listen to new text messages and respond with my voice, handsfree.
customer_reviews.author: Peggy B

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Pros: great sound quality, comfortable fit, ease of use & pairing, and nice range. Con: Doesn't work well while doing cardio excercise. I tried going jogging with it and it made a crackling noise with every step that I took. I can see where it would be better than wired headphones if just doing weights, but it would be nice if I could use them while doing cardio too.
customer_reviews.author: Miss Piggy

customer_reviews.title: Battery life is not as long as it described
customer_reviews.text: Bought the Savor M1100 about 3 weeks ago, everything works just fine, I have two phones connected, works both HTC(Sprint) and G3(T-Mobile), the only problem I have is the battery life, which is very important to me. I don't know if because it has to connect with two phones at the same time, the battery life is not long enough, it's not 4 hours talking time like it says when every time it fully charged, actually, just about 2 hours talking time. Little bit disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: lillyjing

customer_reviews.title: Nice Bluetooth great battery life very clear sound the only ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice Bluetooth great battery life very clear sound the only problem I have it that it picks up your voice and surrounding noise to well and people on the other end of the line complin about hearing the window of my car being opend
customer_reviews.author: Slamboat

customer_reviews.title: M1100 Bluetooth Headset
customer_reviews.text: So far I would have to say that the quality on the speaker is OK. Not what I was hoping for quite frankly. I had read reviews about this particular unit that appeared to be off the charts and Im not hearing that consistently. Battery is very good so far. Features are what the MFG stated and have been easy to use. This would have been a 4-5 Star had the voice quality of the speaker been better.
customer_reviews.author: USC

customer_reviews.title: hard to use
customer_reviews.text: It does not work well. When a call comes in and it gives you a choice to answer by saying ANSWER but it does not answer, have to say answer like 4 times for it to work. Not as cool as they make it sound. Volume sucks, its either too loud or too low. And if you get the volume just right then the system volume hurts your ear. This bluetooth sucks.
customer_reviews.author: Steve chase

customer_reviews.title: Great For The Younger Generation
customer_reviews.text: This EarBud is highly technical & not for someone with handicap hands. It does everything for you but the instructions are not easily understood or at least, not by someone of my age group (62). The buttons are very small & hard to find. I find it very annoying when 'the voice' gives me instructions & gets mad if I don't respond- it gets mad at me, a machine cops an attitude!!
customer_reviews.author: Lennie Moren

customer_reviews.title: Great item.  Medium size but good sound both ear and mic.
customer_reviews.text: This is the only headset that I would consider. I had one before and I broke the on/off switch. But I liked it so much I bought a second one. Good sound quality. I like the shape and size and doesn't break your ear. Also love the shape that keeps it stable in your ear without jamming something in your ear drum. multiple mics to limit wind noise. Does not get rid of it totally but not bad. Windy day, forget it. But slight breeze, its good.
customer_reviews.author: Ohio State

customer_reviews.title: Better & Better
customer_reviews.text: This is like Fifth Bluetooth headset I have used. The sound quality is 9/10 the the audio reminders useful- especial when it tells me I walked away from my phone again. only issue I have is ending a call. you answer via Voice command but hope the other party end the call because tapping the headset end the call is hit or miss for me.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony. K

customer_reviews.title: No blue toothache
customer_reviews.text: Very easy operation, pairing was quick and easy, sounds very clear, good battery life, connects quickly when turned on, and it stays secure in ear and is comfortable. Very good purchase for the money. No need to spend over $50 for a bluetooth ear piece. I'd definitely reccommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Elrickster

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I have owned quite a few Bluetooth headsets over the years and Plantronics makes the best!!! The Savor is light and highly usable and has great sound, a wonderful addition to the Plantronics family! The manual power switch vs the push button. The controls and Vocalyst take some getting used to but the addition of text to voice is is an awesome feature...
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome battery life
customer_reviews.text: I use this everyday. I do not leave it on all the time, but it is able to quickly peer with my phone in time to answer the call starting from the off position. I charge the headset about once every 2 weeks. Another plus is that it uses a standard micro usb connector for charging.
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: Last Plantronics was junk, THIS ONE IS AWESOME!!!
customer_reviews.text: The last Plantronics blue tooth I bought was the worst I've ever had. Constantly disconnecting for no reason leaving me talking to myself. This one is great. No disconnects, nice loud and clear volume. It even survived a wash and dry in the pocket of a pair of shorts and still works great. 5+ stars!!!
customer_reviews.author: Roboiii

customer_reviews.title: Not the quality as advertised
customer_reviews.text: I thought it would be clearer and block background noise. Others can hear my conversation from the Bluetooth as well as the person I'm talking to can hear the noise and others in the background over me. I chose this to have more range, clarity, volume, block background sound, the great rating, etc. I have had other Plantronics devices that I enjoyed but needed a smaller one so I chose this one for the reasons I stated above. It did not meet my expectations. My state is a required hands-free device state so I must endure until but I am not pleased. Thank you for the opportunity to voice my dissatisfaction. Ouida C
customer_reviews.author: Ouida Moore-Cain

customer_reviews.title: I am so disappointed about the quality of this headset
customer_reviews.text: I am so disappointed about the quality of this headset. It works okay and then all of the sudden I hear static through the headset. I kept thinking it was where I was talking so I have tried it in several places and I have the same effect. I think I am going to have to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Golfwife

customer_reviews.title: Not a great bluetooth
customer_reviews.text: This bluetooth is not great. I returned it. The range on it sucks. I couldnt go into the next room without it cutting out and not working. The vocalyst app is the worst. You have to call a number to do anything, it is not an app. This was the stupidest thing ever.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Estby

customer_reviews.title: Worst packaging ever!
customer_reviews.text: This little headset came in a three piece hard plastic packaging, 8" tall, 3" long & 2" wide. It was taped together and extremely difficult to get apart! All this for a headset 2" long & 1/2" wide. A bit overkill. As to the headset, after getting it out of the package, it was a bit anti-climatic! It's ok, not the best I've had but not the worst. Very hard to adjust the volume. Comfort is a "C". Feedback from listeners say I sound like I'm on a speaker phone.
customer_reviews.author: RainMaker

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality, poor battery, hard for people to hear me
customer_reviews.text: This is the worst Plantronics Bluetooth I have ever bought. The batter says 4 hours, I'm barely able to get 2 hours with little use. People always complained they had trouble hearing me. Do not buy this just add some money and buy the Plantronics Legend Bluetooth.
customer_reviews.author: Anon Imre

customer_reviews.title: This is still my favorite travel headset
customer_reviews.text: I love how light and comfortable this headset is. It fits in my ear and supports itself. The clarity is excellent. As long as I remember to charge it at night and charge it however briefly between all of my conference calls, it gets me through the day!
customer_reviews.author: jleejapan

customer_reviews.title: Luv it - If I could only make it work with my laptop
customer_reviews.text: It is great. great sound. audio queues tell you when it is on or off. how much talk time is left. Connected with which device (car, cell phone, laptop) There are more features I have not had the time to figure out yet. it is great.
customer_reviews.author: RLartist

customer_reviews.title: Best bluetooth ever
customer_reviews.text: I've gone through several headsets. Last one was a Voyager. Linked up easily with my iPhone and office phone. Stays linked to both phones simultaneously. Like being able to answer without pushing a button. Light weight and comfortable. Lasts all day with heavy use.
customer_reviews.author: Mfige

customer_reviews.title: Not quite five stars
customer_reviews.text: I have had this item for almost a year and it's been a very good headset. I've got it wet a couple of times and it keeps on ticking. The only complaint I have is the volume of the automated voice when using voice calling is very low and can't seem to be turned up.
customer_reviews.author: Jayme Harris

customer_reviews.title: Extremely Pleased
customer_reviews.text: I lost my Bluetooth which I use for driving, I saw this model on Amazon, and placed the order overnight. I was really surprised to find out the delivery was in even a bit less than 24 hours, (I live in a new development where usually on a Friday afternoon things get too late and are delivered next morning). Price was almost half of in store, and this Plantronics is one of the best I ever owned. Very clear sound, allows music listening, has voice messages and commands, and enough volume to listen to any call even the very soft ones. Thank you Amazon
customer_reviews.author: Elian

customer_reviews.title: I love this ear piece
customer_reviews.text: I already had one of these. I actually found it while leaveing a concert a year or so ago. I cleaned it up and it worked fine. I love it because it talks to you, you can answer the phone with your voice. It's clear and it was the only ear piece I have ever had which actually stayed comfortably in my ear. I loved it so much I bought it for my boyfriend for Valentine's day. Now he loves it too! Since I purchased this one, the one I found has started to get a little staticy so I'm going to actually be purchasing one for myself. This time I will have one fresh out of the pack.
customer_reviews.author: Bernadette Carter

customer_reviews.title: Plantronics Rocks
customer_reviews.text: Love this headset. Advanced Features, excellent reception, battery will last all day. Only negative for me is the way it sets in my ear - i wish it didn't have the little "flange" on the earpiece. Rather have something that "sinks" into my ear. Otherwise, I'd give the product 5 stars!
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Carter

customer_reviews.title: Does the job, but not perfect
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my husband who drives the longest bridge in the world every day to work. He now can make calls hands free, which was the aim of this purchase. I detect some echo in the background when he speaks, but not so much that I can't understand him. He's satisfied with the product so that's what really matters. I must say, the packaging was terrible from the 3rd party vendor. It came in a cushioned envelope with no protection for the device itself. It could have easily been crushed. I was even skeptical as to whether or not it was a brand new product.
customer_reviews.author: L.A.R.

customer_reviews.title: Love this BT
customer_reviews.text: I have lots of BT headsets, but I almost always buy Plantronics. This one works great, sounds great, and I love the new BT version that will stream music. The only downside for me, is that it doesn't fit my ear perfectly, but rarely do any anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Dave Brown

customer_reviews.title: Light and easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: Been using Plantronics products for quite a while now. This headset is light, fits comfortably, but suffers from interference (has to do with all that wifi & Bluetooth congestion). Battery life is poor. That aside, it is easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: El Prof

customer_reviews.title: Good Audio Quality Bluetooth Headset
customer_reviews.text: The transmit and receive audio quality is quite good on this unit, the only negative for me is the actualy ear bud, I would have preferred something a little more form fitting like the Bose. All in all not a bad unit and cheaper than the Bose
customer_reviews.author: Steve C.

customer_reviews.title: Actually 4 1/2 Stars - Best on the market at the time I bought it
customer_reviews.text: I like plantronics brand. The reception & distance still aren't perfect, but it was the best in the market at the time I bought it at a medium expensive but reasonable price, only likely out-performed by much more expensive models.
customer_reviews.author: michifur

customer_reviews.title: This was a lemon.
customer_reviews.text: This was my 2nd Plantronics Savor M1100, which was great and lasted over a year. I was expecting this one to be as good as my first one from Best Buy. In trying to save a little money, I received an inferior product. I purchased it in July 2013 it is now September and I certainly expected it to last more than 2 months. I'm back to my iphone at my ear because every one complains that they can't hear me. I have tried all the adjustments and nothing works. It's just a bad one I guess.
customer_reviews.author: Lea Watson

customer_reviews.title: In Your Ear
customer_reviews.text: I have been using Plantronic headsets since 2005. Love their technlogy especially th noise cancelling. Great sound clarity when on a call on both ends. Voice activation calling feature works well Nice sleek design. Love the voice command prompts.
customer_reviews.author: mephylwill

customer_reviews.title: So please, I had to get 2!!!
customer_reviews.text: I was so impressed with my service from this vendor from the beginning: I received this item before the specified shipping arrival date. The headset links up to the phone with ease and fits snugly in my ear. I bought 2 and gave one to my husband. The only reason I rated this 4 out of 5 stars is because I am not able to adjust the volume via the headset and I didn't receive the charger dock displayed in the picture. Otherwise, I would definitely recommend this vendor and this item to all. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous shopper

customer_reviews.title: very happy with it
customer_reviews.text: After looking up reviews online and found it was rated highly so I had high expectations. Over all I am very happy with it. It doesn't always sync up the first time with my Blackberry but I would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Dave Bryant

customer_reviews.title: Best Bluetooth headset feature wise at this price. Its quite stylish too.
customer_reviews.text: Best Bluetooth headset I have came across at this price point. I loved the feature set. Just recently realized after having it for so long that it can be connected to two devices at the same time.
customer_reviews.author: Richard James

customer_reviews.title: Great Headset
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a good bluetooth headset that was A2DP. This headset is great. I can hear, and be heard clearly, even with a light wind outside. The A2DP feature works great. I have a phone that has built in voice controls and this fits right in without using the Vocalyst feature. My texts are read to me and I can easily reply. It is comfortable and I sometimes forget that it is on. I am not one that likes headsets, but I need one and finally found one I am happy with.
customer_reviews.author: Mandy

customer_reviews.title: Easy to sync
customer_reviews.text: Easy to sync, easy to use. Decent sound. It hurts my ear a bit while wearing it, if over an hour.
customer_reviews.author: Azzacca

customer_reviews.title: Best headset ever!
customer_reviews.text: I went form the worst, JABRA, to the best! I like that it tells me that it is on, and connected. The sound is crisp, clear, and it is the most comfotable headset that I've owned.
customer_reviews.author: Donnyboy

customer_reviews.title: Good value for your $
customer_reviews.text: Great value for $30. Works real good w/some quirks but my experience is that most if not all reasonably priced Bluetooth phone ear units have similar and other "issues".
customer_reviews.author: TK Engineer

customer_reviews.title: Keeps dropping the connection and does not pair correctly.
customer_reviews.text: I had to repair this to my iphone 5 numerous times and it keeps dropping the connection. When I try to answer by saying "answer," the phone does not pick up so I have to manually accept the call on the phone itself. Listening to music isn't bad, but not worth the price. Plantronics usually makes the best bluetooth headseats in my opinion, but this was a let down.
customer_reviews.author: hotbebe711

customer_reviews.title: Very good.
customer_reviews.text: Very good earpiece! I had to work through the selection of ear rings until I found one that didn't cause extreme pain after a couple of hours; reception is clear.
customer_reviews.author: Shepsie

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: The quality is very good, the color is good, like
customer_reviews.author: CHEN YINGMIN

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: This bluetooth is okay, but I honestly like the Plantronics Marquee M155 better. This one is supposed to have better sound quality, but that seems to be true only 1 in every 3 calls. It also has a shorter battery life that the M155 and a shorter range from my phone. If I walk more than about 10 feet away from my phone the call gets gargly. Honestly, keep looking.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Noise cancelling is just ok - was fairly easy to use and would stay in place without the ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this on July 27th 2012 - today is Oct 23rd 2014 and this is how long it has lasted before needing replacement. Noise cancelling is just ok - was fairly easy to use and would stay in place without the over the ear hook if I chose. Call quality on the other end was just medium. I am debating whether to replace with the Plantronics Voyager or the Jawbone.
customer_reviews.author: Dixie L Gilbert

customer_reviews.title: Junk, again
customer_reviews.text: It's a shame that they put so little effort into such a 'personal' device (that is, one you will wear a good portion of the day). Garbled sound. Was easier to just use speaker phone.
customer_reviews.author: L. Shuler

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: I have had several blue tooths in the past but this one did not wow me. It is very uncomfortable to wear . . Even with the hook over the ear it did not sit right . It also only has 4 hrs of talk time , where my other ones have 12 hrs and up. Pros easy to turn on and off . Voice commands work with a 50/50 chance . I will continue to support plantronics products but this one will be going back.
customer_reviews.author: Ginnie

customer_reviews.title: very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: The M1100 has plenty of standby and talk time.. .Emits a very visable light when charging and when you turn it on and insert in ear it audibly tells you how much usable talk time is available...
customer_reviews.author: Boater

customer_reviews.title: Poor audio quality
customer_reviews.text: Don't get me wrong this bluetooth ear piece works well and I have not had it very long or used it much but the reason I have not used it much is because of the poor audio quilaty. Lots of great reviews is what sold me on it. Maybe I recieved a faulity one?
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: Review- Plantronics Savor M1100
customer_reviews.text: This Plantronics Savor M1100 is far superior to my previous Bluetooth, the Plantronics Explorer 330 Headset. The audio is quite good. I find that I seldom have issues with hearing callers or being clearly overheard, even under windy conditions. The only minus is that the Savor battery, when fully charged, only lasts for 4 hours.
customer_reviews.author: Md News

customer_reviews.title: Plantronics Vs Jawbone
customer_reviews.text: If I have to compare with my previous Jawbone, the switch with where it located was sometime mistakenly turned off . For the incoming call, It was not able to tell me the no. These are the two points could be improved.
customer_reviews.author: Mick

customer_reviews.title: Best bluetooth headset by far
customer_reviews.text: I've owned many headsets to date and this has been the best so far. That said, with the widespread of high quality earphones that I can also use for music, I doubt I will buy anymore bluetooth headsets.
customer_reviews.author: Moonie

customer_reviews.title: long distance good fit
customer_reviews.text: Love this head piece . The range is good. Ive been using thihs pice for 4yrs and will not switch . Went to best buy none compares. Long range from ur phone is awesome, u can be in the next room while ur phone is charging.plus gives u earpieces xtra for ur fit.
customer_reviews.author: wuWu

customer_reviews.title: Plantronics Makes a Good Bluetooth- But This Unit Was Defective
customer_reviews.text: I own one of these Plantronics Bluetooth units and have been happy with it. I bought a 2nd unit for a family member. Unfortunately, this unit arrived defective. The on/off switch would not move and so, the Bluetooth did not operate. Amazon third-party provider is crediting my account for the cost of the unit.
customer_reviews.author: Md News

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: I love this Headset! It is comfortable in the ear, easy to use, and has amazing sound quality. I strongly recommend the Plantronics M1100 to anyone who is in need of a top of the line product!
customer_reviews.author: tia_nalani2005

customer_reviews.title: Not all it's cracked up to be. Can you hear me now????
customer_reviews.text: Caller's could not hear me after adjusting the headset numerous times. From the previous reviews it sounded like a great headset but that was not the case.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Poor fit, poor voice commands
customer_reviews.text: The piece moves around too much, maybe that is just MYears. Very limited voice commands.Why don't the voice commands on the phone work when the earpiece is on?
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Actually works in high noise p/u cabs.
customer_reviews.text: This is comfortable. Easy to use. On/off button works right. Great clarity in high noise p/u truck and motor home cabs. Have owned 3 plantronics products; ALL BETTER than advertised. Everyone I know who uses this brand loves them.
customer_reviews.author: Papa Don V

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected
customer_reviews.text: Noise reduction is nonexistent. If anything it's an amplifier of wind noise. Talk volume will blow out your eardrum, but can't be turned up enough for music
customer_reviews.author: Hossdawg

customer_reviews.title: Fair
customer_reviews.text: It fits my earl and is comfortable, I can hear others well, but people on the other end tell me I sound like I'm talking through a tube. I have to talk louder than I'm comfortable with and have to repeat myself frequently. Not sure if I just got a bad one since most reviews are favorable, but I think I'll be looking for a return and upgrade to a better model.
customer_reviews.author: Hogwild

customer_reviews.title: Lower than my expectation
customer_reviews.text: I had this for a week and people on the other side of phone told me they cannot hear me well (it was too faded ...too much bass). I tried it out myself and it was fine but the range was not good. As soon as I was walking away from my phone from one room to another static noise was heard. So anyhow, I returned the item and shopped for Jawbone Era. It has better quality so far. After all, you get what you pay for (most of the cases).
customer_reviews.author: Memo

customer_reviews.title: I really did not care for the fit, and ...
customer_reviews.text: I really did not care for the fit, and the bloody think fell out at the airport and could not find it.
customer_reviews.author: Daemeon R.

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME BLUETOOTH
customer_reviews.text: IVE NEVER HAD SUCH AN AWESOME BLUETOOTH,GREAT VOLUME,EVEN LETS YOU ANSWER OR IGNORE BY USING YOUR VOICE,BLUETOOTH LETS YOU KNOW HOW MANY HOURS LIFE THERE IS LEFT ON YOUR BLUETOOTH AND A WHOLE LOTS OF OTHER FUNTIONS ESPECIALLY IF YOU HAVE THE RIGHT PHONES TO USE WITH IT. BUY IT YOU WONT BE DISAPPOINTED. PLANTRONICS SAVOR M1100 ESPECIALLY IF YOU ARE SLIGHTLY HEARING IMPAIRED. AND THE PRICE WAS GREAT FROM AMAZON.COM
customer_reviews.author: SKYDIVEHAWAII

customer_reviews.title: Does not work well with Iphone
customer_reviews.text: This product will not access your contact list or do voice call. I will answer or ignore a call if you say so, but that's all it will do. I really can't get it to hand up once a call is over. I use it now, until I can find a better product.
customer_reviews.author: Alan from Texas

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: I have had many bluetooth devices. I really like this one. It is small, picks up sounds perfectly. Easy to operate. I would get another one. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazing Grace

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this headset
customer_reviews.text: I'm really enjoying this headset. Light. Effective. What else can I say? Works perfectly with my iPhone. Great sound on both sides. ONLY negative is that I got used to the charging case of my last bluetooth and this one doesn't have it.
customer_reviews.author: Tony Vieceli

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice product and I am very happy for deal, that is what I has been waiting for
customer_reviews.author: Jorge

customer_reviews.title: This is my 2nd bluetooth of this model. I ...
customer_reviews.text: This is my 2nd bluetooth of this model. I keep one in my car & the other at home. Would buy another.
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: Great value and performance
customer_reviews.text: I love this one. Stays in my ear, sound is crisp and clear. It has many useful functions and 4 hr talk time - I love it and would recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Leann Blackey

customer_reviews.title: Love it !!!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic, just what I need. Better than was expected ! totally recommended. If you are looking for comfort discretion and quality.......
customer_reviews.author: ABBA.GLOBAL

customer_reviews.title: Incredibly Uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: This Bluetooth was by far the most uncomfortable I've ever owned. It does not fit well in my ear and I've never been able to wear it for over 15 minutes without pain in my ear. The audio is very weak and, too often, I cannot maintain a conversation because I cannot hear whoever is on the other side of the phone. However, the headset does look very stylish and the mic works well, ergo, the 2 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Show

customer_reviews.title: Full of features - I gifted it to my Sis she liked it
customer_reviews.text: After amazoning too much, I ordered this to my Sister as a present. She uses this for streaming music and calls. She liked it.
customer_reviews.author: arn amazn

customer_reviews.title: A great earpiece
customer_reviews.text: Clean and crisp input and output. Easy setup. Fits nicely, understated look. Good price. 3 hour battery life. Would order again.
customer_reviews.author: A. Moffett

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Not too bad - works well - though lasts only 3.5-4 hours at a shot
customer_reviews.author: stash

customer_reviews.title: I loved this headset so much that I bought one for ...
customer_reviews.text: I loved this headset so much that I bought one for my boyfriend. Clear voice. Very little outside noise.
customer_reviews.author: A. Stensen

customer_reviews.title: An incredibly wonderful device
customer_reviews.text: Compared to other Bluetooth devices I have used in the past, this one is so 22nd century. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: T. U.

customer_reviews.title: nice but tiny
customer_reviews.text: I like the headset, just on the tiny side. need to be careful not to forget where you left it. best used with the earloop.
customer_reviews.author: NiceTallGuy

customer_reviews.title: Very good Bluetooth
customer_reviews.text: I have had Jawbone, Motorola, Samsung,etc.. This is simply the best Bluetooth I have ever used! Would definitely buy again!
customer_reviews.author: sammy

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Loved it, but on/off switch started fall out. Lost it
customer_reviews.author: Sherry Higgins

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I have had Plantronics for years. This is great because it fits snugly in my hard to fit ear and has great sound reproduction.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

product_meta.title: Plantronics Savor M1100 Bluetooth Headset - Retail Packaging
product_meta.description:
Size:.!Only Bluetooth 2.0| Color:Black| Product Packaging:Standard PackagingNotable for its triple-mic design and intelligent voice recognition, the Plantronics Savor M1100 Bluetooth Headset takes wireless communications to a new level. With the Savor headset, you can use your voice to answer calls, check headset status, or dial Plantronics Vocalyst or Microsoft's Bing411 audio services. The headset also lets you stream music, podcasts, and more wirelessly from your mobile phone using A2DP Bluetooth technology. A lightweight build and flexible ear tips increase the headset's comfort.

AMAZON.COM


Notable for its triple-mic design and intelligent voice recognition, the Plantronics Savor M1100 Bluetooth Headset takes wireless communications to a new level. With the Savor headset, you can use your voice to answer calls, check headset status, or dial Plantronics Vocalyst or Microsoft's Bing411 audio services. The headset also lets you stream music, podcasts, and more wirelessly from your mobile phone using A2DP Bluetooth technology. A lightweight build and flexible ear tips increase the headset's comfort.

SAVOR M1100
BLUETOOTH HEADSET
AT A GLANCE:

 * Triple-mic AudioiQ3 and DSP technologies to reduce background noise
 * Voice-activation commands for hands-free operation
 * Free, one-year subscription to Plantronics Vocalyst voice and text services
 * Music, GPS directions, and other audio streamed wirelessly from your A2DP-enabled phone
 * iPhone users can view headset battery level on their phone
 * Four hours of talk time and seven days of standby
 * Backed by a one-year limited warranty

PLANTRONICS SAVOR M1100 BLUETOOTH HEADSET
Voice-activation technology allows you to answer calls without lifting a finger.
View larger.Compact, lightweight design with soft, flexible, silicone-gel ear tips. View larger.THREE MICROPHONES TO CAPTURE YOUR NATURAL VOICE
The Savor sports a unique V-frame design with three synchronized mics strategically placed to best capture your voice. The addition of a third, noise-activated microphone better isolates your voice for a more natural sound without the need for a long boom.

The AudioiQ3 technology with advanced Digital Signal Processing (DSP) further reduces background noise and enables clear conversations between you and your listener.

VOICE COMMANDS FOR HANDS-FREE OPERATION
With voice-activation technology, you can answer calls without lifting a finger. Simply say "answer" to pick up an incoming call, or press the dedicated voice button for a host of other convenient commands, such as "pair mode," "redial," "cancel," or "call information."

Using this feature, you can access Plantronics Vocalyst hands-free text and audio email service, or Microsoft's Bing 411 service for traffic, weather, sports, news, and other updates.

ONE-YEAR FREE SUBSCRIPTION TO VOCALYST
The Savor package includes a free, one-year subscription to Plantronics Vocalyst (service in USA only), which provides you with a variety of voice and text services that you can access directly from the headset. With Vocalyst, you can use simple voice commands to have your emails, text messages, or Twitter feed read aloud to you, and even send text replies while you're listening. And if you want to record a reminder for yourself, Vocalyst can send it to you as an audio email.

NOTE: Vocalyst's email services are supported by Gmail, AOL, and Yahoo. The text feature works with Blackberry and Android smart phones.

VOICE AND VISUAL ALERTS
Enhanced voice alerts such as "phone connected," "low battery," "talk time X hours," and "pairing" take out the guesswork of managing calls or keeping track of the headset's battery level. Additionally, built-in software enables you to monitor the headset's battery level on your iPhone.

STREAM MUSIC AND MORE FROM YOUR MOBILE PHONE
Supporting the Bluetooth A2DP profile, Savor lets you stream music, podcasts, audiobooks, GPS directions, and more wirelessly from your A2DP-enabled mobile phone right to the headset.

COMFY EAR TIPS AND A LIGHTWEIGHT CONSTRUCTION
The Savor package includes soft, flexible, silicone gel ear tips in three different sizes, along with an optional earloop for multiple wearing options--providing you with the ideal fit, with or without glasses.

The compact, lightweight design and in-ear wearing style let you put on the headset quickly and easily when a call comes in.

Experience up to four hours of talk time and seven days of standby time, and preserve the battery power by using the dedicated on/off switch.

The Plantronics Savor M1100 is backed by a one-year limited warranty.

GET THE MOST FROM YOUR PLANTRONICS HEADSET WITH APPS FOR ANDROID
ONE TOUCH CONFERENCE CALL CONNECTION
InstantMeeting automatically identifies conference calls and dialing details from your calendar, reminds you just before the meeting is scheduled to begin, and, with one touch, connects you to your conference call.

WHAT'S IN THE BOX
Savor M1100 Bluetooth Headset, three sets of ear tips, optional earloop, AC charger, and carrying pouch.
feature_bullets: Three microphones deliver superior sound quality
Convenient voice commands with dedicated voice button
Plantronics Vocalyst text and voice services
A2DP for streaming music, podcasts and more
Bing411 for news, traffic and driving directions
